name: Low Poly Zombie Horde FPS
description:
Introduction:

U need to have steam open to start a game!

Multiplayer should work with steam.

I made this Zombie Horde FPS within a month or so.

It's not polished at all and there are still a lot of Bugs.

Please leave a comment with your thoughts and suggestion :)

Steam Multiplayer:

Host opens a Lobby.

Guest joins via Find Game.

CONTROLS:
  • W A S D - Move
  • X - Use Item
  • C - Crouch
  • RMB - Aim
  • LMB - Fire
  • Mouse Wheel UP / Down - Switch Weapon
  • F - Interact
  • Q - Flashlight
  • R - Reload
  • E - Knife
  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump
